Marilyn Edgar Park
Marilyn Edgar Park is located at 26531 Hillside Drive. It offers substantial and attractive grounds as well as several amenities:

Teddy Bear Park
Teddy Bear Park it located at 27207 Robinson Road. The park is completely fenced around and offers playground equipment for smaller children as well as a pavilion for birthday parties. The park also offers amenties such a water fountains and restrooms.

[Parks & Rec Calendar](https://oakridgenorthcitytx.documents-on-demand.com/Calendar)

For questions regarding ballfield or pavilion rentals at either park please contact the city at 281-292-4648.

If there is a problem or the gate is locked when there is a reservation, please call PD at 281-292-4642.

City Pool

Oak Ridge North's community swimming pool is located in Marilyn Edgar Park, 26531 Hillside Drive.

For information about pool hours or purchasing a pool pass please contact the City at 281-292-4648

![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5afa0d_08878b767c2f4184936033ff9ce7de58~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_600,h_450,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/5afa0d_08878b767c2f4184936033ff9ce7de58~mv2.png)



Monday - Thursday: 7:30 am - 4:30 pm

Fridays: 8:00 am - 4:00 pm

Closed Saturday & Sunday
